crag.name: 關子嶺
crag.description: 關子嶺岩場位於台南市白河區，是台灣南部著名的砂岩攀岩場地。岩場以其獨特的砂岩地形和知名的泥漿溫泉聞名，擁有多條路線。這裡的岩質提供了良好的摩擦力，適合各種程度的攀岩者，特別是在涼爽的秋冬季節攀登。攀岩後可到附近享受獨特的泥漿溫泉。
crag.descriptionEn: Guanziling is located in Baihe District, Tainan City, and is a famous sandstone climbing area in southern Taiwan. The crag is known for its unique sandstone formations and the famous mud hot springs. The rock quality provides excellent friction, suitable for climbers of all levels, especially during the cool autumn and winter seasons. After climbing, enjoy the unique mud hot springs nearby.

transportation.description: 從台南市區沿國道3號北上，接國道8號往白河方向，約50分鐘車程
transportation.descriptionEn: From Tainan city, take Freeway 3 north, connect to Freeway 8 towards Baihe, about 50 minutes drive

transportation.description: 搭乘新營客運往關子嶺方向，在關子嶺站下車
transportation.descriptionEn: Take Xinying Bus towards Guanziling, get off at Guanziling stop

areas.name: 主岩壁
areas.description: 關子嶺主要的攀登區域，擁有多條經典路線。
areas.descriptionEn: The main climbing area of Guanziling with many classic routes.

areas.name: 初學者區
areas.description: 適合新手練習的區域，路線較為簡單。
areas.descriptionEn: An area suitable for beginners with easier routes.

areas.name: 進階區
areas.description: 較難的攀登區域，適合有經驗的攀岩者。
areas.descriptionEn: More challenging area suitable for experienced climbers.

routes.name: 溫泉之路
routes.description: 關子嶺經典路線，攀登後可享受溫泉。
routes.descriptionEn: Classic Guanziling route, enjoy hot springs after climbing.

routes.name: 砂岩摩擦
routes.description: 測試腳法的好路線，砂岩摩擦力極佳。
routes.descriptionEn: Great route to test footwork, excellent sandstone friction.

routes.name: 泥漿浴
routes.description: 適合初學者的入門路線。

routes.name: 火山岩
routes.description: 進階區的經典路線，需要良好的耐力。
routes.descriptionEn: Classic route in the advanced sector, requires good endurance.
